resources.string: Camera permission is needed to take the picture
Give a name to the new folder. If you do not give a name, It will not be create!
Give a name to your folder..Folder did not create..
Root Folder is not exist...Restart aplication
Give a new name to your Folder. If you do not give a name, It will not be change!
Give a name to your Folder..Folder did not rename..
Give a name to your File..File did not rename..
Give a new name to your file.If you do not give a name, It will not be change!
You should create a folder to use this function...
You will delete ALL inside of this FOLDER...\n\n Once you removed you can no longer retrieve your file...

1. PERMISSION

 Storage:It is important that grants the permits application to store and access their media to create new files.

 Camera: This permit allows access to the camera and take pictures.

 Note:Only devices 23 marshmallow or older need APi grant permits.


2. FOLDERS

 New Folder: To create a new folder you must assign a name, otherwise you will not be created.

 Rename: Hold down the folder to RENAME until the pop-up menu appears. Daz click RENAME and assign the new name. If you do not give your folder a new name will not be renamed.

 Delete: Hold down the FOLDER you want to remove until the pop-up menu appears. Daz click Confirm and ready. deleted folder.

 ¡Attention! If you delete you can not recover the folder or content that is content.


Share: You can only share photos!


3.PHOTOS

 New Photo: To take a picture, click on the yellow button and click on the option contains a camera as an icon. You need to choose your camera by default.

 Rename: Hold down the PHOTO you want RENAME until the pop-up menu appears. Daz click RENAME and assign the new name. If you do not give your photo a new name will not be renamed.

 Delete: Hold down the PHOTO you want to REMOVE until the pop-up menu appears. Daz click Confirm and ready. PHOTO eliminated.

 ¡Attention! If you delete you can not recover the folder or content that is content.

 Share: Hold down the PHOTO you want to SHARE until the pop-up menu appears. You choose the means by which you want to share and ready.
